Method.name: RemoveFromAllClasses
Method.Implementation: #Dim sc As %Status = $$$OK set sc = $System.OBJ.GetClassList(.Classes, "/application=0 /system=0 /percent=0 /mapped=0") Quit:$$$ISERR(sc) Set sc = ..RemoveFromClassLocal(.Classes, Replace, Capitalize) Quit sc

Method.name: RemoveFromSubclassesOf
Method.Implementation:
#Dim sc As %Status = $$$OK Set RS = ##class(%ResultSet).%New("%Dictionary.ClassDefinition:SubclassOf") Set sc = RS.%Execute(Class) Quit:$$$ISERR(sc)
Set Classes(Class) = ""
While (RS.%Next(.sc)) { Quit:$$$ISERR(sc) Set Classes(RS.Data("Name")) = "" }
Set sc = ..RemoveFromClassLocal(.Classes, Replace, Capitalize) Quit sc

Method.name: RemoveFromMatchingClasses
Method.Implementation:
#Dim sc As %Status = $$$OK
Set SQL = "SELECT ID FROM %Dictionary.ClassDefinition Where ID LIKE ?" Set ST = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%New() Set sc = ST.%Prepare(SQL) Quit:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
#Dim RS As %SQL.StatementResult Set RS = ST.%Execute(Mask)
While RS.%Next() { Set Classes(RS.%GetData(1)) = "" }
Set sc = ..RemoveFromClassLocal(.Classes, Replace, Capitalize) Quit sc

Method.name: RemoveFromClassLocal
Method.Implementation: #Dim sc,sc1 As %Status = $$$OK Set Class = "" For { Set Class = $Order(Classes(Class)) Quit:Class="" Set sc1 = ..RemoveFromClass(Class, Replace, Capitalize) Set sc = $$$ADDSC(sc, sc1) } Quit sc

Method.name: RemoveFromClass
Method.Implementation:
#Dim sc As %Status = $$$OK
Set sc = ##class(SMR.TextServices).GetTextAsString(, Class, .Text) Quit:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
Set sc = ..ReplaceSystemCalls(.Text, Replace, Capitalize) Quit:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
Set sc = ..ReplaceDynamicClasses(.Text) Quit:$$$ISERR(sc) sc
Set sc = ##class(SMR.TextServices).SetTextFromString(, Class, .Text) Quit sc

Method.name: ReplaceSystemCalls
Method.Implementation: Set Position = 1 For { Set Position = $Find(Text, ".$", Position) Quit:Position=0 Set:Capitalize $Extract(Text, Position) = $ZCVT($Extract(Text, Position), "U") Set $Extract(Text, Position-1) = Replace } Quit $$$OK

Method.name: ReplaceDynamicClasses
Method.Implementation: #Dim sc,sc1 As %Status = $$$OK Set ReplaceList = $LB($LB("%Library\.Object","%Library.DynamicObject"),$LB("%Object","%DynamicObject"),$LB("%Library.Array","%Library.DynamicArray"),$LB("%Array","%DynamicArray")) For i=1:1:$LL(ReplaceList) { Set ReplacePair = $LG(ReplaceList, i) Set sc1 = ..ReplaceRegexp(.Text, $LG(ReplacePair, 1), $LG(ReplacePair, 2)) Set sc = $$$ADDSC(sc, sc1) } Return sc

Method.name: ReplaceRegexp
Method.Implementation: #Dim Matcher As %Regex.Matcher = ##class(%Regex.Matcher).%New(Pattern, Text) Set Text = Matcher.ReplaceAll(ReplacePattern) Quit Matcher.Status
